Radio: Traditional radio stations can continue to provide news updates and information on air, even without television.
Print media: Newspapers and magazines can continue to serve as a source of news and information.
Online streaming platforms: Platforms like YouTube, Netflix, and Twitch can be used to stream news channels and interviews.
Public libraries and bookstores: These places can offer access to newspapers, magazines, and books on current events.
Community gatherings: People can gather at local community centers or places of worship for discussions and sharing of news.
